ygData.subject: Re: Lava & Corpses  was  Bard Handicap of Sorts
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t think this is correct - at least in the little spot I was trapped - past the lavafall -  near the lava zone to Sol B (unless there s a trick I m
ygData.messageBody:
I don't think this is correct - at least in the little spot I was trapped -
past the lavafall - near the lava zone to Sol B (unless there's a "trick"
I'm unaware of. Believe me - I tried my hardest to drag that corpse
anywhere...

Also - maybe something got nerfed.. For example - I don't recall this
happening since the most recent Levitate Nerf (granted I haven't spent much
time levitated) but if you stay still - and are pretty high up - every few
seconds you'll start to sink...

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 1:15 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lava & Corpses was Bard Handicap of Sorts


>
> You can drag stuff out of lava anywhere else in Sol A (you may
> have to get creative with your levitate, but you can do it).
> It's just the section past that lavafall where you can't pull
> it out.
>
